name: Logicer
description:
Logicer is a logic game made for ue4jam Summer 2019 where player have to solve puzzles to go to the next room.

Game name: Logicer

Team name: madDumpling

Controls:

  • WASD + Mouse - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • LMB - Shoot
  • RMB - Interact/Power shoot

All content was created during the Game jam, except:

  • Sounds - From Soundly
  • First person started content - Weapon mesh and shooting mechanics, weapon and hands animations, hands mesh
